value.title: Gnarly Skateboarders Trying Dangerously To Hitch A Ride On Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Skateboarders sometimes try to do bumper hitching, which is dangerous and should not be done, but the question is how will self-driving cars deal with those gnarly riders.

value.title: Volkswagen Will Develop In-House Self-Driving Chip to Compete With Tesla, Apple
value.excerpt: Although Tesla’s expensive and strictly in-house developed autonomous driving software has a long way to go to actually achieve self-driving, its German rival Volkswagen is going down the same path to build its own driverless capabilities.

value.title: Elon Musk Shares Painfully Obvious Idea About the Difficulty of Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Elon Musk, one of the wealthiest people on the planet, sent a tweet Thursday night about the real problem with self-driving cars. And as you can probably guess by now, it’s one of those things that sounds profound until you stop to think about it for three seconds.

value.title: Waymo Ridehailing and Delivery Focus
value.excerpt: CEOs. The Waymo plan is to expand its ridehailing business from Phoenix to other places. Waymo One. They will expand Waymo driving to truck delivering services. Waymo Via. Waymo One and Waymo via will have no driver behind the wheel.

value.title: Waymo’s New CEOs Say Self-Driving Unit Eyes More Outside Funding
value.excerpt: Waymo, the prized self-driving arm of Alphabet Inc., is looking to nab further outside investment and make acquisitions of its own, the company’s new chief executive officers said.

value.title: Baidu Will Launch Driverless Robotaxis In Beijing This Week
value.excerpt: Baidu announced that it will open the first paid, driverless robotaxi service in China, starting Sunday, May 2.

value.title: Wealthfront releases a new 'Self-Driving Money' feature to make saving easier
value.excerpt: Wealthfront's new Self-Driving Money feature lets customers take a hands-off approach to saving, and it could potentially be more effective.

value.title: CityLab Daily: Toyota Is Building a City for Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Also today: a look at southern California’s battle with drought, and could Pittsburgh to be a hub for Black venture capital?

value.title: Lyft's sale of its self-driving tech unit to Toyota for $550 million moves its profit timeline up
value.excerpt: The deal with Toyota's Woven Planet division will allow Lyft to hit its profitability target one quarter earlier, the company said.

value.title: AWS DeepRacer device software now open source
value.excerpt: AWS DeepRacer is the fastest way to get started with machine learning (ML). You can train reinforcement learning (RL) models by using a 1/18th scale autonomous vehicle in a cloud-based virtual simulator and compete for prizes and glory in the global AWS DeepRacer League. value.title: Tesla is becoming more of an artificial intelligence and robotic company, says Elon Musk
value.excerpt: Elon Musk made the argument that Tesla is going to be known more as an artificial intelligence and robotic company. For a while now, Musk has been pushing this idea that investors shouldn’t just see Tesla as an automaker and energy company,

value.title: Toyota acquires Lyft's self-driving unit for $550 million
value.excerpt: Toyota Motor Corp. has acquired the self-driving division of American ride-hailing company Lyft for $550 million, in a move that highlights the Japanese automaker’s ambitions in that technology

value.title: Toyota acquires Lyft self-driving division for $550 million
value.excerpt: Toyota subsidiary Woven Planet announced that it would acquire Lyft's Level 5 self-driving R&D division for $550 million.

value.title: Lyft sells self-driving unit to Toyota’s Woven Planet for $550M
value.excerpt: Ride-hailing company Lyft has sold off its autonomous vehicle unit to Toyota’s Woven Planet Holdings subsidiary for $550 million, the latest in a string of acquisitions spurred by the cost and lengthy timelines to commercialize autonomous vehicle technology.

value.title: Waymo’s leadership shift spotlights self-driving car challenges
value.excerpt: Waymo's recent executive shuffle signals driverless technology has a ways to go before a robust self-driving car industry becomes reality.

value.title: Explaining Why Explainable AI (XAI) Is Needed For Autonomous Vehicles And Especially Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Explainable AI (XAI) is going to be vital for Autonomous Vehicles (AVs) and will be first expected in self-driving cars, providing explanations about the driving journey.

value.title: Tesla owners warned of 'full self-driving' risks even before fatal crash
value.excerpt: Tesla's "full self-driving" feature has attempted to drive under a railroad crossing arm while a speeding train passes. It's nearly driven head on into a concrete wall of a parking garage, attempted ill-advised left turns, clipped at least one curb ...

value.title: Baidu, Geely plan $7.7 billion smart car push
value.excerpt: Zhejiang Geely Holding Group, aims to spend 50 billion yuan ($7.7 billion) over the next five years on developing smart-car technology. The company intends to hire between 2,500 and 3,000 staff for the project over the next two to three years,

value.title: Video: See how a self-driving car perceives the world

value.title: Xiaomi Is Said to Mull Investing in AI Chipmaker Black Sesame
value.excerpt: Mobile phone giant Xiaomi Corp. is among investors considering joining a funding round of at least 1.5 billion yuan ($231 million) for Black Sesame Technologies Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.

value.title: Tesla drivers with 'full self-driving' warned of risks and need to pay attention
value.excerpt: Tesla CEO Elon Musk said in March that about 2,000 Tesla owners were able to use "full self-driving" and the company revoked the beta program to drivers who did not pay sufficient attention to the road.

value.title: Not Many Realize That There Is Crossover Tech That Crisscrosses Self-Driving Cars And Human-Driven Cars
value.excerpt: Crossover tech from self-driving cars to human-driven cars is a thing, though this must be done with sensibility else the result could be disastrous.

value.title: EU outlines ambitious artificial intelligence regulations focused on risky uses
value.excerpt: Risky uses of artificial intelligence that threaten people's safety or rights such as live facial scanning should be banned or tightly controlled, European Union officials said Wednesday.

value.title: Google Ethical AI Group’s Turmoil Began Long Before Public Unraveling
value.excerpt: The ouster of lead researchers Gebru, Mitchell followed years of friction over how Google handled allegations of harassment and bias

value.title: Meituan raises $10 bln for self-driving cars, drone delivery
value.excerpt: Chinese food delivery giant Meituan says it has raised nearly $10 billion in a sale of convertible bonds and additional shares, with plans to invest in and develop delivery technologies

value.title: Europe proposes strict regulation of artificial intelligence.
value.excerpt: The rules have far-reaching implications for tech firms like Amazon, Google, Facebook and Microsoft, which have poured resources into developing the technology.
